To copy a document:

A takes 100 minutes B takes 80 minutes C takes 50 minutes

They work in two phases: First, A and B work together for 20 minutes Then, B and C continue working together until the task is complete

Questions: (1) How many minutes did B and C work together?

(2) How much of the total task did B copy?
